remarks: The identity natural transformation.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-Jan-2017.)
statement:
fucidcl.q $e |- Q = ( C FuncCat D ) $.
fucidcl.n $e |- N = ( C Nat D ) $.
fucidcl.x $e |- .1. = ( Id ` D ) $.
fucidcl.f $e |- ( ph -> F e. ( C Func D ) ) $.
fucidcl $p |- ( ph -> ( .1. o. ( 1st ` F ) ) e. ( F N F ) ) $.
